definitions.text: reestablish on a new, usually improved, basis or make new or like new
examples: We renewed our friendship after a hiatus of twenty years

definitions.text: amplify (an electron current) by causing part of the power in the output circuit to act upon the input circuit
bring, lead, or force to abandon a wrong or evil course of life, conduct, and adopt a right one
return to life; get or give new life or energy
examples: The week at the spa restored me

definitions.text: replace (tissue or a body part) through the formation of new tissue

examples: regenerate by redemption from error or decay
